participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Friendly and open-minded, Emma enjoys engaging in deep conversations and values her relationships.
participant_1.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. my father was a door to door salesman. i also have a dog walking business.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Introverted yet passionate, George finds joy in his work with bees and enjoys the solitude it brings.
participant_2.background: i am a bee farmer. i have zero family that i'm close to. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya.
